text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.title: Sticky Hoppers Configuration
text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.option.nsi:
Here is the default "recipe" for filtering non-stackable items:
- One Tripwire Hook in each slots 1 and 5,
- One String in each slots 2 and 4,
- The item to filter in the center slot.
This recipe can be edited directly in the configuration file.
